facebook.share: The Milo's Kitchen Treat Truck for dogs is coming to your town!
facebook.rsvpshare: I’m going to the Milo's Kitchen Treat Truck for dogs at {EVENT}!

meta.title: Milo's Kitchen ® | Home-Style Dog Treats
meta.description: Milo's Kitchen Treat Truck is especially designed to give your dog a Milo's Kitchen treat.

events.Title: Milo's Kitchen Treat Truck
events.Description:
The Milo’s Kitchen Treat Truck – A Treat Truck just for dogs!
This summer, we’re taking our kitchen on the road and bringing our 100% real, home-style treats to dogs across America. We think all dogs deserve the same goodness as the rest of the family; that’s why every one of our wholesome treats is made in the USA. Come visit the Treat Truck for free samples, family portraits, personalized giveaways, and our lounge.
